io.mpos.provider.listener
Interface AccessoryConnectionStateListener

All Superinterfaces:
MposListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultPaymentProcess
public interface AccessoryConnectionStateListener
extends MposListener

Listener for the connection to an accessory (e.g. PED or printer)

Since:
2.0.0

Method Summary
 void onAccessoryConnectFailure(MposError error)
          Failure handler when an accessory could not be connected
 void onAccessoryConnectSuccess(Accessory accessory)
          Success handler when an accessory is connected
 void onAccessoryDisconnectFailure(Accessory accessory, MposError error)
          Failure handler for disconnection from an accessory.
 void onAccessoryDisconnectSuccess(Accessory accessory)
          Success handler for disconnection from an accessory.
 

Method Detail

onAccessoryConnectSuccess

void onAccessoryConnectSuccess(Accessory accessory)
Success handler when an accessory is connected

Parameters:
accessory - The connected accessory
Since:
2.0.0

onAccessoryConnectFailure

void onAccessoryConnectFailure(MposError error)
Failure handler when an accessory could not be connected

Parameters:
error - Error that describes what happened
Since:
2.0.0

onAccessoryDisconnectSuccess

void onAccessoryDisconnectSuccess(Accessory accessory)
Success handler for disconnection from an accessory.

Parameters:
accessory - The accessory that was disconnected - the reference is no longer valid for interactions
Since:
2.0.0

onAccessoryDisconnectFailure

void onAccessoryDisconnectFailure(Accessory accessory,
                                  MposError error)
Failure handler for disconnection from an accessory.

Parameters:
accessory - The accessory that should have been disconnected
error - Error describing why the disconnect failed
Since:
2.0.0
